### 0.2.0 (2020-12-18)

- Improve performance of variable-size integers encoding and decoding.
  (#24, #30, @samoht)
- Require `short_hash` operations to be explicitly unstaged.
  (#15, @CraigFe)
- Require `equal` and `compare` operations to be explicitly unstaged.
  (#16, @samoht)

### 0.1.0 (2020-10-16)

Initial release.
